titleStmt.title: Hosanna to the son of David, or, A testimony to the Lord Christ shewing his rule and reign over the people of the Jews upon earth a thousand years together with his second personal appearance proved from the Scripture of truth : with a general word of life from the point to saints and sinners / by Samuel Grosvenour.
titleStmt.author: Grosvenour, Samuel.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
